# selectedAnnotation

**Interface Property**

The selected annotation on the map.

## Declaration

```swift
selectedAnnotation?: Annotation;
```

## Discussion

The default value is `null.`

## Configuring map annotations

- **annotationForCluster**: Modifies cluster annotations.
- **annotations**: An array holding all the annotations on the map.
